name: Rescue Your Crew
description:
Rescue Your Crew from pirates !

Note: The ship only moves by your sail, rotation of your ship only matters when rotation of the sail maxes out.

No sound!

There is no sound in game :(

So please listen your favorite music while playing.

Controls MOUSE
Rotate Sail
A - D
Rotate Ship
RRestart Level
EscReturn to Menu
pSkip Level
